application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Westminster Chapel Buckingham GateLondonSW1E 6BS
description: Details of vestibule screen, integration of the re-used elements of the screen, indicative service runs for the proposed coffee counter and the W.C. near the west exit, floor to be built over the existing stair to Castle Lane confirming retention of the stair beneath, thermal insulation to the ceiling, structural alterations to the balcony, written specification of structural works and brickwork/stone skirt at the portico; all internal doors, acoustic insulation to historic fabric, new fire safety equipment and indicate routes for associated services, gates and automated doors, glazed screen and curtain rails, flooring in the vestibule and auditorium; and measures to mitigate the potential for antisocial behaviour in the portico pursuant to Condition 3 parts i, ii, iii, iv, v, vi, vii viii and ix, Condition 4 parts  i, ii, iii, iv, v, ix and Condition 5 of listed building consent dated 12 June 2019 (18/09633/LBC).
